Absolutely! Here is a table containing the possible risks for the PREVENT-IA product, classified by type, along with corresponding mitigation plans:

```markdown
| **Risk Category**             | **Identified Risks**                                         | **Mitigation Plans**                                                                                           |
|-------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **Technology / Technical**    | Dependence on AI model providers                               | Diversify AI model suppliers; implement periodic reviews and updates of the AI models                          |
|                               | Energy consumption                                            | Optimize algorithms for energy efficiency; implement cloud provider's energy-saving features                    |
|                               | Unfriendly interfaces                                         | Conduct user research; involve UI/UX experts; iterative design and testing                                      |
|                               | Poor prioritization of functionalities                        | Regular stakeholder meetings; prioritize features based on user feedback and business value                     |
|                               | Difficulty in measuring training quality                      | Develop clear KPIs for training effectiveness; integrate feedback loops; employ robust assessment methods       |
|                               | Scalability issues                                            | Implement auto-scaling groups; conduct load testing; optimize cloud architecture for scalability                |
|                               |                                                                    |                                                                                               |
| **Regulatory / Compliance**   | AI use regulations                                             | Stay up-to-date with regulations; consult with legal experts; ensure compliance with local and international laws |
|                               |                                                                    |                                                                                               |
| **Reputation / Public Opinion**| Negative public opinion on the use of AI                       | Launch awareness campaigns highlighting benefits and safeguards; gather user testimonials                        |
|                               | Low visibility on social media                                | Develop and execute a comprehensive social media strategy; engage with industry influencers                      |
|                               |                                                                    |                                                                                               |
| **Operational**               | Lack of feedback                                               | Regularly collect user feedback through surveys and focus groups; integrate feedback into product development    |
|                               | User resistance to new technologies                           | Implement change management strategies; offer training and support for users transitioning to the new platform   |
|                               |                                                                    |                                                                                               |
| **Financial**                 | High operational costs                                        | Optimize resource utilization; regularly review and manage budgets                                              |
|                               |                                                                    |                                                                                               |
| **Legal**                     | Non-compliance with occupational safety regulations           | Conduct regular legal audits; work closely with the HR and Legal departments to ensure guidelines are followed     |
|                               |                                                                    |                                                                                               |
```
